00008 struct Spell
00009 {
00010   enum SpellType
00011     {
00012       ST_Spell          = 0, // Normal spell, must be cast and costs mana
00013       ST_Ability        = 1, // Inert ability, always in effect
00014       ST_Blight         = 2, // Blight disease
00015       ST_Disease        = 3, // Common disease
00016       ST_Curse          = 4, // Curse (?)
00017       ST_Power          = 5  // Power, can use once a day
00018     };
00019 
00020   enum Flags
00021     {
00022       F_Autocalc        = 1, 
00023       F_PCStart         = 2,
00024       F_Always          = 4 // Casting always succeeds
00025     };
00026 
00027   struct SPDTstruct
00028   {
00029     int type;   // SpellType
00030     int cost;   // Mana cost
00031     int flags;  // Flags
00032   };
00033 
00034   SPDTstruct data;
00035   std::string name;
00036   EffectList effects;
00037 
00038   void load(ESMReader &esm)
00039   {
00040     name = esm.getHNOString("FNAM");
00041     esm.getHNT(data, "SPDT", 12);
00042     effects.load(esm);
00043   }
00044 };
00045 }
